name: Covid-19 Live Stats Lite
author: charleshop

sections.description:
Covid-19 Live Stats WordPress plugin is an awesome plugin for displaying Coronavirus (COVID-19) data on your WordPress site. You can simply use the shortcodes and widgets to show live data on your posts, pages or sidebars.

Covid-19 is an infectious disease caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) and the World Health Organization (WHO) declared the 2019–20 coronavirus outbreak a pandemic. Covid-19 Live Stats WordPress plugin is a great tool to show all sorts of data related to the virus outbreak on your website.

Features

Easy to Use
Coronavirus Live Statistics Table
Live Data from a Reliable Source
Worldwide or Country Specific Statistics
Live View of Total Number of Covid19 Confirmed, Recovered, and Death cases
Data Display as Table or Cards
Sorting by Any Type of Data
Widgets and Shortcode Support
Beautiful Modern User Interface
Lightweight and Fast
Very Clean and Minimal design
Style and Theme Customization Options
Fully Responsive
Compatibility with WordPress 5.3+
Compatible with all Popular WordPress Themes
Compatible with all Modern Browsers
Installation Guide and Detailed User Manual
No Coding Knowledge Required
Free Lifetime Update

Data Source

All COVID-19 Live Data shown using this plugin is provided by Coronavirus monitor (https://rapidapi.com/astsiatsko/api/coronavirus-monitor/details) By astsiatsko (https://rapidapi.com/user/astsiatsko). You can check the Privacy Policy here (https://rapidapi.com/privacy-policy).

Arbitrary section
sections.installation:
To install follow this steps:

  1. Upload covid19livestats to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
